archival_memory.hydration_importance: helps with energy levels, digestion, and skin
archival_memory.water_intake_practice: keep a big water bottle and drink herbal teas in the evening instead of coffee
archival_memory.summer_hydration: drink more water during hot Kansas summers
archival_memory.preventative_care_importance: stay on top of preventative care
archival_memory.vaccination_schedule: get flu shot, pneumonia shot, and new RSV vaccine every year
archival_memory.bone_density_monitoring: keep an eye on bone density due to family history of osteoporosis
archival_memory.self_compassion: learned to give myself grace on off days
archival_memory.consistency_over_perfection: not about being perfect, it's about being consistent
archival_memory.overall_health_feeling: feeling pretty good about where I am
archival_memory.health_control: can't control everything about my health, but do what I can
archival_memory.long_term_commitment: in it for the long haul
